label.aboutUsDescription: What is the first thought that pops into your mind when you think about Octover? Is it pumpkins, Halloween, Canadan Thanksiving or maybe Oktoverfest in Munich? Whatever it may be, the 10th month of year is when autumn moves into fun. This is just some random text that should be viewed when user clicks on Read more.
